QuestData.Title: Farmers Who Fight
QuestData.Description:
I was hoping for a squad of Proudmoore Academy's finest, but I guess you'll have to do.
What we lack in manpower we make up for in courage! Even the farmers here won't give up their land without a fight.
Send the bravest of them to me. They will fight better alongside our marines than by themselves out in the fields!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recruit 6 Vigil Hill Farmers into the militia.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need anyone willing and able to fight!
QuestData.RewardText: We'll get those volunteers paired up with the regulars and give 'em a fighting chance.
